016
017package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bukkit;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.util.FileUtils;
020import org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin;
021import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
022
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.InputStream;
025import java.nio.file.Files;
026import java.nio.file.Path;
027import java.util.Objects;
028
029/**
030 * A factory class for creating {@link BukkitYaml}.
031 */
032public final class BukkitYamlFactory {
033
034    private BukkitYamlFactory() {
035        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * Creates a {@link BukkitYaml} instance.
040     * <p>
041     * This method will not load the file.
042     *
043     * @param path the file path
044     * @return {@link BukkitYaml} instance
045     */
046    public static @NotNull BukkitYaml getBukkitYaml(@NotNull Path path) {
047        Objects.requireNonNull(path);
048        return new BukkitYaml(path);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Creates a loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance.
053     *
054     * @param path the file path
055     * @return loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance
056     * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs
057     */
058    public static @NotNull BukkitYaml load(@NotNull Path path) throws IOException {
059        BukkitYaml yaml = getBukkitYaml(path);
060
061        yaml.load();
062
063        return yaml;
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Creates a loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance.
068     * <p>
069     * This method will copy from the plugin resource if the file does not exists,
070     * or create the empty file if the file does not exists and the plugin resource was not found.
071     *
072     * @param plugin   the plugin instance
073     * @param filePath the file path with the plugin directory as the root
074     * @return loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance
075     * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs
076     * @see BukkitYamlFactory#createFilePath(Plugin, String)
077     */
078    public static @NotNull BukkitYaml load(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull String filePath) throws IOException {
079        BukkitYaml yaml = getBukkitYaml(copyResourceIfNotExists(plugin, filePath));
080
081        yaml.load();
082
083        return yaml;
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Creates a loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance.
088     * <p>
089     * If an {@link IOException} occurs, this method ignores it.
090     *
091     * @param path the file path
092     * @return loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance
093     */
094    public static @NotNull BukkitYaml loadUnsafe(@NotNull Path path) {
095        BukkitYaml yaml = getBukkitYaml(path);
096
097        try {
098            yaml.load();
099        } catch (IOException ignored) {
100        }
101
102        return yaml;
103    }
104
105    /**
106     * Creates a loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance.
107     * <p>
108     * If an {@link IOException} occurs, this method ignores it.
109     *
110     * @param plugin   the plugin instance
111     * @param filePath the file path with the plugin directory as the root
112     * @return loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance
113     * @see BukkitYamlFactory#createFilePath(Plugin, String)
114     */
115    public static @NotNull BukkitYaml loadUnsafe(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull String filePath) {
116        Path path = createFilePath(plugin, filePath);
117
118        try {
119            copyResourceIfNotExists(plugin, filePath, path);
120        } catch (IOException ignored) {
121        }
122
123
124        return loadUnsafe(path);
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * Copies the plugin resource if the file does not exists.
129     *
130     * @param plugin   the plugin instance
131     * @param filePath the file path with the plugin directory as the root
132     * @return loaded {@link BukkitYaml} instance
133     * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs
134     * @see BukkitYamlFactory#createFilePath(Plugin, String)
135     */
136    @NotNull
137    public static Path copyResourceIfNotExists(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull String filePath) throws IOException {
138        Path path = createFilePath(plugin, filePath);
139
140        copyResourceIfNotExists(plugin, filePath, path);
141
142        return path;
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Creates the file path.
147     * <p>
148     * The returns path is {@code SERVER_ROOT/plugins/PLUGIN_NAME/FILE_PATH}.
149     *
150     * @param plugin   the plugin instance
151     * @param filePath the file path with the plugin directory as the root
152     * @return the file path
153     */
154    @NotNull
155    public static Path createFilePath(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull String filePath) {
156        Objects.requireNonNull(plugin);
157        Objects.requireNonNull(filePath);
158
159        if (filePath.isEmpty()) {
160            throw new IllegalArgumentException();
161        }
162
163        Path temp = plugin.getDataFolder().toPath();
164
165        for (String path : filePath.split("/")) {
166            if (path.isEmpty()) {
167                throw new IllegalArgumentException();
168            }
169
170            temp = temp.resolve(path);
171        }
172
173        return temp;
174    }
175
176    private static void copyResourceIfNotExists(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull String filePath, @NotNull Path path) throws IOException {
177        if (!Files.exists(path)) {
178            FileUtils.createDirectoriesIfNotExists(path.getParent());
179
180            try (InputStream resourceFile = plugin.getResource(filePath)) {
181                if (resourceFile != null) {
182                    Files.copy(resourceFile, path);
183                }
184            }
185        }
186    }
187}
